    • is2Doutside

      public boolean is2Doutside​(double fromX, double fromY, double toX, double toY)
      Description copied from class: RenderObj
      Generally check, if this object is to be painted on screen.
      Specified by:
      is2Doutside in class RenderObj
      Parameters:

      fromY - bounding rect to paint (from y)
      toX - bounding rect to paint (to x)
